_description: A sophisticated story of love — four quatrains in dialogue (with inserted couplets) and introductory heading: ‘Hey troly loly lo’

BLAdd31922.First Lines: mayde whether go youI go to þe medow to mylke my Cowe…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …adew farewell & kysse me nowNay in goode fayth I wyll not melle with you
BLAdd31922.Note: Below last line, “ut supra wyll not melle with you.”
